name: Dragon Fruit Cafe
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to interact

Instructions:

Walk to top of restaurant.

Click on chef to get dragon fruit.

Walk to bottom of restaurants where customers are seated.

Click on seated customers to give them a dragon fruit.

Repeat until you get bored.

Credits:

Wall/Floor art - Anonymous Contributor

All the other "art" - Bo Yuan Zheng

Programming - Bo Yuan Zheng

Concept - Anonymouse Contributor, Bo Yuan Zheng
